title: [Cancer] One radiologist supported by AI detected more cases of breast cancer in screening mammography than two radiologists working together. Traditionally, two radiologists read every exam. The researchers say that AI is now ready to be implemented in breast cancer screening.

[Neuroscience] Researchers have used a 3D human neural cell culture model to show that the exercise-induced muscle hormone, irisin, reduces the level of amyloid beta associated with Alzheimer’s disease. The findings could lead to new therapeutic strategies for the treatment of Alzheimer’s disease.
